attributes.action: Ignore those who want the British National Party (BNP) banned and accept that they are a political party which stands up for the beliefs of 50% of the British Population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BNP is far from the anti-democratic fascists which many make them out to be, They, and many organisations such as Unite Against Fascism are being anti-democratic in their stance against the British peoples opinions. the idea of 'Britishness' as being acceptance to all and tolerance of people who want Sharia law in this country is laughable, I myself agree with the BNP's policies but I do not wish to impose my opinions on everyone else, end this age of ignorance towards more than 50% of our society and be more accepting towards those who do not share your view, or else you are being as bad as Adolf Hitler and his National Socialist party.

rejection.details: You need to create a clear call-to-action for your petition
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
